deity_markdown: [Abadar](/Deities.aspx?ID=1), [Alglenweis](/Deities.aspx?ID=171), [Apsu](/Deities.aspx?ID=149), [Bolka](/Deities.aspx?ID=85), [Brigh](/Deities.aspx?ID=33), [Demon Bringers](/Deities.aspx?ID=230), [Dwarven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=196), [Findeladlara](/Deities.aspx?ID=109), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=54), [Mammon](/Deities.aspx?ID=68), [Nocticula](/Deities.aspx?ID=45), [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=17), [Sun Wukong](/Deities.aspx?ID=183), [The Endless Road](/Deities.aspx?ID=246), [The Laborer's Bastion](/Deities.aspx?ID=253), [The Prismatic Ray](/Deities.aspx?ID=207), [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=18)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=54)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 326 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodline**
[Genie](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=11)

**Deities**
[Abadar](/Deities.aspx?ID=1), [Alglenweis](/Deities.aspx?ID=171), [Apsu](/Deities.aspx?ID=149), [Bolka](/Deities.aspx?ID=85), [Brigh](/Deities.aspx?ID=33), [Demon Bringers](/Deities.aspx?ID=230), [Dwarven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=196), [Findeladlara](/Deities.aspx?ID=109), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=54), [Mammon](/Deities.aspx?ID=68), [Nocticula](/Deities.aspx?ID=45), [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=17), [Sun Wukong](/Deities.aspx?ID=183), [The Endless Road](/Deities.aspx?ID=246), [The Laborer's Bastion](/Deities.aspx?ID=253), [The Prismatic Ray](/Deities.aspx?ID=207), [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=18)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

<row>1 minute ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 0 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You conjure a temporary object from eldritch energy. It must be of vegetable matter (such as wood or paper) and 5 cubic feet or smaller. It can't rely on intricate artistry or complex moving parts, never fulfills a cost or the like, and can't be made of precious materials or materials with a rarity of uncommon or higher. It is obviously temporarily conjured, and thus can't be sold or passed off as a genuine item.

---
**Heightened (5th)** The item is metal and can include common minerals, like feldspar or quartz.
name: Creation

---

</summary>
text: Creation Source Core Rulebook pg. 326 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Bloodline Genie Deities Abadar, Alglenweis, Apsu, Bolka, Brigh, Demon Bringers, Dwarven Pantheon, Findeladlara, Isis, Mammon, Nocticula, Shelyn, Sun Wukong, The Endless Road, The Laborer's Bastion, The Prismatic Ray, Torag Cast 1 minute (material, somatic, verbal) Range 0 feet Duration 1 hour --- You conjure a temporary object from eldritch energy. It must be of vegetable matter (such as wood or paper) and 5 cubic feet or smaller. It can't rely on intricate artistry or complex moving parts, never fulfills a cost or the like, and can't be made of precious materials or materials with a rarity of uncommon or higher. It is obviously temporarily conjured, and thus can't be sold or passed off as a genuine item. --- Heightened (5th) The item is metal and can include common minerals, like feldspar or quartz.
